neighborhood_overview:
Conveniently located 15 minutes away to Downtown Boston. Walk to subway. Bus across the street. Vibrant neighborhood with stores, restaurants , bars at walking distance. Walkable at anytime of the day. Multicultural neighborhood with friendly and humble people.
Enjoy 24 street parking in front of the house, NO meter to feed next or around the house- please pay attention to the street cleaning signs.
There is a barbershop and beauty salon near the house.
